get.description:
## Authorization

**Required role:** `owner_admin`, `owner_validator` or `superadmin`.

**Scope:** an owner administrator or validator can only see geolocalisations
related to the owner.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language to localize data and message returned by the API.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of result to skip from start.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Sort direction (ascencing or descending).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: collection_id
parameters.description: Select only geolocalisations for images in the specified collection(s).

schema.errorMessage: should be an integer or an array of integers

parameters.name: date_georef_min
parameters.description: Select only geolocalisations made after the specified date.

parameters.name: date_georef_max
parameters.description: Select only geolocalisations made before the specified date.

parameters.name: image_id
parameters.description: Select only geolocalisations for the specified image(s).

schema.errorMessage: should be an integer or an array of integers

parameters.name: is_published
parameters.description: Select only published (true) or unpublished (false) geolocalisations. Defaults to true.

parameters.name: original_id
parameters.description: Select only geolocalisations for images with the specified original ID(s).

schema.errorMessage: should be a string or an array of strings at least 2 characters long

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: Select only geolocalisations for images belonging to the specified owner(s).

schema.errorMessage: should be an integer or an array of integers

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Select only geolocalisations in the specified state(s).

schema.errorMessage: should be a geolocalisation state or an array of geolocalisation states

parameters.name: username_volunteer
parameters.description: Select only geolocalisations made by volunteers with matching usernames.

schema.errorMessage: should be a string or an array of strings at least 2 characters long

put.description:
The geolocalisation is completed and validator will be notified for a
check. If the validation mode is true, the geolocalisation is an
improvement made by a validator.

## Authorization required for improvements i.e. validation mode

**Required role for validation:** `owner_admin`, `owner_validator` or `superadmin`.

**Scope:** an owner administrator or validator can only update
geolocalisations/validations related to the owner. Anonymous users can
update there geolocalisations on final step or creation

get.description:
List images and associated location or a priori location typically to
display on a map. Non localized images without a priori location are not
returned.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language to localize data and message returned by the API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of result to skip from start.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Filter image by id(s).

schema.errorMessage: should be an integer or an array of integers

parameters.name: original_id
parameters.description: Filter image by original id(s).

schema.errorMessage: should be a string or an array of strings

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: Select only the images belonging to the owner(s) with the specified ID(s).

schema.errorMessage: should be an integer or an array of integers

parameters.name: collection_id
parameters.description: Select only the images belonging to the collection(s) with the specified ID(s).

schema.errorMessage: should be an integer or an array of integers

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Select only the images georeferenced by user(s) with the specified ID(s).

schema.errorMessage: should be an integer or an array of integers

parameters.name: publish_state
parameters.description: Select published/unpublished/all collections. 'published' by default

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Select only image with given geolocation state

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: List of attributes to retrieve. Returns all if unspecified.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Latitude of the point to consider for distance to images.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude of the point to consider for distance to images.

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: Select only image inside the given bounding box.

parameters.name: only_unlocked
parameters.description: Select only unlocked images.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Select only images with a title, description or original ID containing at least one of the specified keywords.

schema.errorMessage: should be a string or an array of strings

parameters.name: sortKey
parameters.description: Sort images by Distance, title or date shot.

schema.errorMessage: should be a string

parameters.name: place_names
parameters.description: Select only images where the specified places are visible.

schema.errorMessage: should be a string or an array of strings

parameters.name: wkt_roi
parameters.description: Select only images with a location or footprint that intersects the specified WKT polygon.

parameters.name: intersect_location
parameters.description: Select only images with a location that intersects the WKT polygon specified in the "wkt_roi" parameter.

parameters.name: intersect_footprint
parameters.description: Select only images with a footprint that intersects the WKT polygon specified in the "wkt_roi" parameter.

parameters.name: date_shot_min
parameters.description: Select only images shot after the specified date.

parameters.name: date_shot_max
parameters.description: Select only images shot before the specified date.

parameters.name: date_inserted_min
parameters.description: Select only images inserted after the specified date.

parameters.name: date_inserted_max
parameters.description: Select only images inserted before the specified date.

parameters.name: date_georef_min
parameters.description: Select only images georeferenced after the specified date.

parameters.name: date_georef_max
parameters.description: Select only images georeferenced before the specified date.

parameters.name: date_validated_min
parameters.description: Select only images validated after the specified date.

parameters.name: date_validated_max
parameters.description: Select only images validated before the specified date.

parameters.name: date_downloaded_max
parameters.description: Select only images downloaded before the specified date.

parameters.name: view_type
parameters.description: Select only image whos view_type is equal to.

parameters.name: POI_latitude
parameters.description: Latitude of the point on the map.

parameters.name: POI_longitude
parameters.description: Longitude of the point on the map.

parameters.name: POI_MaxDistance
parameters.description: Max Distance to cover from point on map.

parameters.name: license_type
parameters.description: Select only images whos license_type_id matches the code in the license_type table.

parameters.name: near_by_images
parameters.description: True eq images that either contain the specified point in their footprint or are within the specified maximum distance from the point. If false or omitted, only images that both contain the point and are within the maximum distance are returned.

parameters.description: Longitude of the point to consider for distance to images.

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: Select only image inside the given bounding box.

parameters.name: only_unlocked
parameters.description: Select only unlocked images.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Select only images with a title, description or original ID containing at least one of the specified keywords.

schema.errorMessage: should be a string or an array of strings

parameters.name: sortKey
parameters.description: Sort images by Distance, title or date shot.

schema.errorMessage: should be a string

parameters.name: place_names
parameters.description: Select only images where the specified places are visible.

schema.errorMessage: should be a string or an array of strings

parameters.name: wkt_roi
parameters.description: Select only images with a location or footprint that intersects the specified WKT polygon.

parameters.name: intersect_location
parameters.description: Select only images with a location that intersects the WKT polygon specified in the "wkt_roi" parameter.

parameters.name: intersect_footprint
parameters.description: Select only images with a footprint that intersects the WKT polygon specified in the "wkt_roi" parameter.

parameters.name: date_shot_min
parameters.description: Select only images shot after the specified date.

parameters.name: date_shot_max
parameters.description: Select only images shot before the specified date.

parameters.name: date_inserted_min
parameters.description: Select only images inserted after the specified date.

parameters.name: date_inserted_max
parameters.description: Select only images inserted before the specified date.

parameters.name: date_georef_min
parameters.description: Select only images georeferenced after the specified date.

parameters.name: date_georef_max
parameters.description: Select only images georeferenced before the specified date.

parameters.name: date_validated_min
parameters.description: Select only images validated after the specified date.

parameters.name: date_validated_max
parameters.description: Select only images validated before the specified date.

parameters.name: date_downloaded_max
parameters.description: Select only images downloaded before the specified date.

parameters.name: view_type
parameters.description: Select only image whos view_type is equal to.

parameters.name: POI_latitude
parameters.description: Latitude of the point on the map.

parameters.name: POI_longitude
parameters.description: Longitude of the point on the map.

parameters.name: POI_MaxDistance
parameters.description: Max Distance to cover from point on map.

parameters.name: license_type
parameters.description: Select only images whos license_type_id matches the code in the license_type table.

parameters.name: near_by_images
parameters.description: True eq images that either contain the specified point in their footprint or are within the specified maximum distance from the point. If false or omitted, only images that both contain the point and are within the maximum distance are returned.

## Authorization

their assigned collection.

get.description:
## Authorization

**Scope:** only owner administrator, validator or user can see non validated observations 
related to them. Others can only see validated observations.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language to localize data and message returned by the API.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of result to skip from start.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Select only observations with the specified ID(s).

schema.errorMessage: should be an integer or an array of integers

parameters.name: image_id
parameters.description: Select only observations made on the specified image(s).

schema.errorMessage: should be an integer or an array of integers

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Select only observations in the specified state(s).

schema.errorMessage: should be an observation state or an array of observation states

parameters.name: date_created_min
parameters.description: Select only observations made after the specified date.

parameters.name: date_created_max
parameters.description: Select only observations made before the specified date.

parameters.name: date_validated_min
parameters.description: Select only observations validated after the specified date.

parameters.name: date_validated_max
parameters.description: Select only observations validated before the specified date.

parameters.name: original_id
parameters.description: Select only observations made on images with the specified original ID(s).

schema.errorMessage: should be a string or an array of strings at least 2 characters long

parameters.name: collection_id
parameters.description: Select only observations made on images in the specified collection(s).

schema.errorMessage: should be an integer or an array of integers

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: Select only observations made on images belonging to the specified owner(s).

schema.errorMessage: should be an integer or an array of integers

parameters.name: volunteer_id
parameters.description: Select only observations made by the specified volunteer(s).

schema.errorMessage: should be an integer or an array of integers

parameters.name: username_volunteer
parameters.description: Select only observations made by volunteers with matching usernames.

schema.errorMessage: should be a string or an array of strings at least 2 characters long

get.description:
## Authorization

**Required role:** `owner_admin`, `owner_validator` or `superadmin`.

**Scope:** an owner administrator or validator can only see users who have
participated in their assigned collection. A user is defined to have
participated in a collection if he or she has geolocated an image in that
collection.

parameters.description: Select only the users who have configured the specified language as their language.

parameters.name: letter
parameters.description: Select only the users who have or have not subscribed to the newsletter.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Select only users with a username that contains any of the specified case-insensitive string or strings.

schema.errorMessage: should be a string or an array of strings at least 2 characters long

bearerToken.name: Authorization
bearerToken.description:
To authenticate to most operations of the API, the client must sent a
valid token in the Authorization header. The value of the header must be
the standard HTTP authentication scheme "Bearer" followed by one space
and the token.
